page.title: 19CREDITS
page.content:
The survey in this area was carried out by three different schools. Each school surveyed four of the squares and researched three different topics. Thanks are extended to Mr C Bishop of the Milk Marketing Board and Mr D Edwards of the Jersey Evening Post.
Pages 1- 6 Hautlieu School Sixth Form Marc Medland, Tim Mitchel, and Rebecca Gibaut. Pages 7-12 St Saviours School 3rd year juniors as a joint effort. Pages 13-18 Grands Vaux School 3rd year juniors. Staff :- Hautlieu School Mrs N Mansell St Saviour Mr P Hayhurst Grands Vaux Mr B. Hall
